title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories on the x axis representing Month, and Number of followers in millions in each Month on the y axis.

Jiff Pom @Jiffpom is higher than any other categories with value 6.6, followed by Doug the Pug @itsdougthepug, and Maruto @Marutaro. Down to category Manny @manny the frenchie with the lowest value of 1.0.
The highest value at Jiff Pom @Jiffpom is almost 6.6 times larger than the minimum value of Manny @manny the frenchie.
